::Prowl::

Prowl slows down from 400 mph to about 20 in several seconds, his 
optics and scanners, as well as his mind, scanning the area. There was 
at least one bot alive, Prowl could feel him.

The Maximal lands near the robot that was still alive, kneeling down 
to look at him.

"You allright?" he asks.
